alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 8:08AM AKST until February 25 at 10:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting up to 35 mph. * WHERE...Over Steese Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 10 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and worst blowing snow will be over Eagle Summit.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
